decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2 x Location plans, P609/01, P609/02 and P609/03. Received: 27th February 2017  ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension to the outbuilding hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing outbuilding.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the outbuilding without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey extension to the garage
